mapper.insert:
insert into tb_red_packet
id, red_money, create_time, finish_time, customer_id, brand_id, shop_detail_id, red_remainder_money, red_type,
#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{redMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{createTime,jdbcType=DATETIME}, #{finishTime,jdbcType=DATETIME}, #{customerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{brandId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{shopDetailId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{redRemainderMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{redType,jdbcType=INT},
mapper.select: select * from tb_red_packet where customer_id = #{customerId} and red_remainder_money > 0 and red_type = ${redType} ORDER BY create_time asc LIMIT 0,1
mapper.update: update tb_red_packet set red_remainder_money = ${redRemainderMoney} where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select COUNT(1) redCount,SUM(red_money) redMoney,trp.shop_detail_id shopDetailId, (select COUNT(1) from tb_order td inner join tb_order_payment_item top on td.id = top.order_id where td.order_state in (2,10,11,12) and td.production_status in (2,3) and top.pay_time > = CONCAT(#{useBeginDate},' 00:00:00') and top.pay_time < = CONCAT(#{useEndDate},' 23:59:59') and td.shop_detail_id = trp.shop_detail_id and top.result_data = trp.id GROUP BY top.result_data ) useRedCount, (select SUM(top.pay_value) from tb_order td inner join tb_order_payment_item top on td.id = top.order_id where td.order_state in (2,10,11,12) and td.production_status in (2,3) and top.pay_time > = CONCAT(#{useBeginDate},' 00:00:00') and top.pay_time < = CONCAT(#{useEndDate},' 23:59:59') and td.shop_detail_id = trp.shop_detail_id and top.result_data = trp.id ) useRedMoney, (select COUNT(1) from tb_order td inner join tb_order_payment_item top on td.id = top.order_id where td.order_state in (2,10,11,12) and td.production_status in (2,3) and top.pay_time > = CONCAT(#{useBeginDate},' 00:00:00') and top.pay_time < = CONCAT(#{useEndDate},' 23:59:59') and td.shop_detail_id = trp.shop_detail_id and top.result_data = trp.id and td.parent_order_id is null GROUP BY td.id) useRedOrderCount, (select COUNT(1) from tb_order td inner join tb_order_payment_item top on td.id = top.order_id where td.order_state in (2,10,11,12) and td.production_status in (2,3) and top.pay_time > = CONCAT(#{useBeginDate},' 00:00:00') and top.pay_time < = CONCAT(#{useEndDate},' 23:59:59') and td.shop_detail_id = trp.shop_detail_id and top.result_data = trp.id GROUP BY td.id) useRedOrderMoney from tb_red_packet trp where trp.red_type = ${redType} and trp.create_time > = CONCAT(#{grantBeginDate},' 00:00:00') and trp.create_time < = CONCAT(#{grantEndDate},' 23:59:59') GROUP BY trp.shop_detail_id
